definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: The table uses a beamer below the surface with a mirror to project the visualizations.
sentences.chinese: 下面的表使用一個帶有鏡面投影儀項目的可視化。

sentences.english: Start with high-level conceptual and visual design.
sentences.chinese: 從高級概念性的和可視化設計入手。

sentences.english: The different types of visual teleportation are.
sentences.chinese: 不同類型的可視化的心靈運輸是。

sentences.english: However, visualization is not always necessary or helpful.
sentences.chinese: 然而，可視化不總是必要或有幫助。

sentences.english: The main research productions are as follows:(1)A component pattern 3-D visualization platform for tourism resources was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 架構了構件式的旅遊資源三維可視化平臺體系結構。

sentences.english: Andthen the visualization of the geological modeling is introduced. Finally, a conclusionis provided.
sentences.chinese: 然後了可視化地質建模技術的介紹。

sentences.english: Both auralization and visualization are very important for building up a virtual sound environment.
sentences.chinese: 可聽化和可視化是構建虛擬視聽環境的兩個重要方面。

sentences.english: Visual Task Tips is free for non-commercial use.
sentences.chinese: 可視化任務提示是免費的，非商業用途。

sentences.english: In this paper, a visual approach for performing FMEA is provided to deal with the subject.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，本文呈現了一個進行FMEA的可視化方法。

sentences.english: It introduces interchange formats, for domain models as well as visual models.
sentences.chinese: 它還引入了針對領域模型和可視化模型的交換格式。

sentences.english: So, this is where our analysis of visualization techniques begins.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這就是我們的可視化技術分析開始的地方。

sentences.english: This visual modelling accomplishes two things.
sentences.chinese: 這一可視化建模完成兩件事情。

sentences.english: Iris is an innovative sampling re-synthesizer that frees you to create sounds that could never before be produced.
sentences.chinese: 新穎的採樣合成器，它可以讓你將聲音變得可視化。

sentences.english: Objective To build digitized visible model of the male pelvic floor of the Chinese visible human.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立中國人體男性盆底局部可視化數字模型。

sentences.english: The result has proved the application value of template-based visual scene editor.
sentences.chinese: 實踐證明了基於模板的可視化場景編輯器的應用價值。

sentences.english: Virtual reality and visualization technology is a cross-technology of muti-subject.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬現實可視化技術是一門多學科交叉技術。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3

definition: Kai-Fu Lee (1961-), Taiwanese computer scientist and IT executive, founding president of Google China 2005-2009
